563:18: pañcacakṣuḥparigrahaṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānāṃ mārgadarśayitrī bhagavan prajñāpāramitā|
563:27: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāmupādāya mātā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā|
563:34: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
563:39: tathaiva manasi kartavyā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā yathā śāstā|
563:40: tathaiva namaskartavyā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā yathā śāstā||
563:41: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt-kuto nu bateyamāryasya śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā?
563:43: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-kuta iyamāryasya śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā?
563:45: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'numodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃsteṣāṃ paurvakāṇāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yaśca dānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
563:46: yaśca śīlamayo yaśca kṣāntimayo yaśca vīryamayo yaśca dhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
563:49: api nu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṃgamā pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvajñatāmārgāvatārāya|
563:50: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jātyandhānāṃ śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā apariṇāyakamabhavyaṃ mārgāvatārāya,
563:51: abhavyaṃ grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā gantum,
563:52: evameva kauśika dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntivīryaṃ dhyānaṃ ca prajñāpāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate|
563:56: yadā punaḥ kauśika dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntirvīyaṃ dhyānaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
563:58: tadā hyāsāṃ cakṣuḥpratilambho bhavati pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvajñatāmārgāvatārāya sarvajñatānuprāptaye||
563:59: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā?
563:60: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-rūpasya śāriputra abhinirhāro draṣṭavyaḥ|
563:65: evamabhinirhāreṇa pañcānāṃ skandhānāmabhinirhāraḥ prajñāpāramitāyā abhinirhāro'bhinirhāra ityucyate||
563:66: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-evamabhinirhāreṇa abhinirhṛtā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā katamaṃ dharmamarpayati?
563:70: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat-kimiyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatāmapi nārpayati?
563:71: bhagavānāha-yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi-kimiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatāmapi nārpayatīti?
563:77: śakra āha-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati,
563:80: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-sacedevamapi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo saṃjñāsyate,
563:86: astyeṣa subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa dūrīkariṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
563:91: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte paridīpitāyāṃ na rūpaṃ paridīpitaṃ bhavati|
563:92: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ|
563:101: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte katamena paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
563:102: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha-na bhagavan rūpaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti,
563:104: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān|
563:117: kiṃ punarevaṃ saṃjānānaḥ-evamahaṃ sarvajñajñānasamanvāgata sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi,
563:120: na hyeṣa prajñāpāramitāniṣyando ya imān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti sattvopalambhaḥ|
563:131: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā||
563:132: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-yo bhagavan iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'dhimokṣayiṣyati na kāṅkṣiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati na dhandhāyiṣyati,
563:134: kiyacciracaritāvī ca sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
563:135: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmarthataśca dharmataśca arthanayataśca dharmanayataśca anugamiṣyati anubhotsyate'nubodhayiṣyati ca?
563:136: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nyebhyo lokadhātubhyaścyuto buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchya ihopapanno veditavyaḥ|
563:138: yaḥ kaścicchāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nyebhyo lokadhātubhyaścyuto buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchaya ihopapanno bhavati,
563:139: sa imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ śṛṇuyāt,
563:140: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā atra śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmutpādayet-śāstā me saṃmukhībhūt iti,
563:145: ciracaritāvī sa śāriputra tathārūpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ|
563:146: bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ sa śāriputra tathārūpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ||
563:147: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-śakyā punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitā śrotuṃ vā upalakṣyayituṃ vā samanvāhartuṃ vā upapādayituṃ vā upadhārayituṃ vā?
563:151: anena vā ākāreṇa liṅgena nimitteneti śakyā nirdeṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā?
563:153: neyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā skandhaśo vā dhātuśo vā āyatanaśo vā śakyā nirdeṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā samanvāhartuṃ vā upapādayituṃ vā upadhārayituṃ vā|
563:156: atyantaviviktatvātsubhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ na śakyā prajñāpāramitā nirdeṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā samanvāhartuṃ vā upapādayituṃ vā upadhārayituṃ vā|
563:159: skandhadhātvāyatanameva hi subhūte śūnyaṃ viviktaṃ śāntam|
563:160: iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ ca advayametaedadvaidhīkāraṃ śūnyatvādviviktatvāt|
563:164: yadā na bhavati saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ,
563:166: sthaviaraḥ subhūtirāha-kiyacciracaritāvī sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyo ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpatsyate?
563:168: syātkhalu punaḥ subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvā bahūni buddhaśatāni bahūni buddhasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhaśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā teṣāmantike brahmacaryaṃ caritvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na śraddadhyurnādhimuñceyuḥ|
563:170: pūrvamapi teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikādasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmagauravatā abhūt|
563:176: te tatonidānaṃ dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitena ācitena upacitena etarhyapi gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmapakrāmanti|
563:177: agauravatayā aśraddadhānā anadhimuñcanto na kāyena na cittena sāmagrīṃ dadati|
563:178: te sāmagrīmadadānā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na jānanti na paśyanti na budhyante na vedayante|
563:186: te tena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitena ācitena upacitena duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmābhisaṃskariṣyanti|
563:187: tena te duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā abhisaṃskṛtena saṃcitenācitenopacitena imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāṃ pratyākhyāsyanti pratikṣepsyanti pratikrokṣyanti,
563:189: asyāḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pratyākhyānena pratikṣepeṇa pratikrośena atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā pratyākhyātā bhavati,
563:192: te svasaṃtānānupahatya dagdhāḥ pareṣāmapyalpabuddhikānāmalpaprajñānāmalpapuṇyānāmalpakuśalamūlānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śraddhāmātrakasamanvāgatānāṃ premamātrakasamanvāgatānāṃ prasādamātrakasamanvāgatānāṃ chandamātrakasamanvāgatānāmādikarmikāṇāmabhavyarūpāṇāṃ tadapi śraddhāmātrakaṃ premamātrakaṃ prasādamātrakaṃ chandamātrakaṃ vicchandayiṣyanti vivecayiṣyanti vivartayiṣyanti,
563:195: evaṃ te ātmasaṃtānānupahatya vivecya parasaṃtānānapyupahatya vivecya prajñāpāramitāmabhyākhyāsyanti|
563:201: evaṃ teṣāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ triratnātparibāhyabhāvo bhaviṣyati|
563:202: te sattvānāṃ hitasukhopacchedakriyayā mahānirayavipākasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma upaceṣyanti|
563:203: te anenaivaṃrūpeṇa karmābhisaṃskāreṇopasthāpitena samutthāpitena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīśatāni bahūni varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi mahānirayeṣūpapatsyante|
563:205: teṣāṃ tathā suciraṃ mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati|
563:209: te tatra vikṣiptāsteṣu mahānirayeṣūpapannāḥ samānāstatrāpi mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti|
563:210: teṣāṃ tatrāpi mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tatrāpi punareva tathaiva tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati|
563:211: te tasyāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanyāṃ prādurbhūtāyāṃ tataścyutāḥ samānāḥ punareva anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayāstatra kṣepsyante|
563:214: teṣāṃ tatrāpi suciraṃ mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tatrāpi tathaiva tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati|
563:215: te tasyāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanyāṃ prādurbhūtāyāṃ punareva tataścyutāstenaiva akṣīṇena sāvaśeṣeṇa karmaṇā ihaiva lokadhātau punaḥ kṣepsyante|
563:217: te punareva tāni mahānirayeṣu mahānti mahānirayaduḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti|
563:223: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-pañca bhagavan ānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni asya manoduścaritasya vāgduścaritasya ca na prativarṇikānyapi na anurūpāṇyapi na pratirūpāṇyapi bhavanti|
563:225: pañcānantaryāṇi śāriputra karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitānyasya manoduścaritasya ca vāgduścaritasya ca na prativarṇikānyapi na anurūpāṇyapi na pratirūpāṇyapi asya karmaṇaḥ kṛtasya saṃcitasya ācitasya upacitasya|
563:226: ye kecidimāṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
563:233: te svasaṃtānān saviṣān kṛtvā parasaṃtānān saviṣān kariṣyanti|
563:235: svayaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā anavabudhyamānāḥ parānapi grāhayiṣyanti,
563:238: kutastaiḥ saha saṃvāsaṃ kuto vā lābhasatkāraṃ kutaḥ sthānam?
563:240: dharmadūṣakā hi te śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyā iti|
563:242: kṛṣṇānirjātikāḥ kṛṣṇāhijātikāste śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ|
563:243: teṣāṃ śāriputra tathārūpāṇāṃ pudgālānāṃ ye śrotavyaṃ maṃsyante,
563:246: ime te śāriputra dharmadūṣakāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ|
563:247: śāriputra āha-na bhagavatā tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamākhyātam|
563:248: bhagavānāha-tiṣṭhatu śāriputra tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam|
563:250: mā tathārūpasya pudgalasya tadātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ śrutvā uṣṇaṃ rūdhiraṃ mukhādāgacchet,
563:257: maiva mahāpratibhayaṃ tasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamaśrauṣīdyasyeme doṣāḥ saṃvidyante||
563:258: na bhagavānāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyāvakāśaṃ karoti-iyattasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti|
563:259: dvitīyakamapi tṛtīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-ākhyātu me bhagavāṃstasya pudgalasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam|
563:260: paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyatianena vāṅbhanaḥkarmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitenopacitenopacitena evaṃ mahāntaṃ mahānirayeṣvātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇīteti|
563:261: bhagavānāha-eṣa eva śāriputra paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati,
563:262: yadanena vāṅbhanoduścaritena akuśalena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa abhisaṃskṛtena saṃcitenācitenopacitena iyacciraduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti|
563:263: yā etasyaiva śāriputra duḥkhasyāprameyatā bahuduḥkhatā vyākhyātā,
563:264: eṣa eva śuklāṃśikasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā saṃvego bhaviṣyati|
563:265: tataḥ sa tebhyo dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyebhyaḥ karmabhyo vinivṛtya puṇyābhisaṃskārameva kuryāt,
563:266: jīvitahetorapi saddharmaṃ na pratikṣepsyati-mā bhūdasmākamapi tādṛśairduḥkhai samavadhānamiti||
563:267: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-susaṃvṛtakāyakarmavākkarmamanaskarmaṇā bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bhavitavyam|
563:269: yatra hi nāma bhagavan evaṃrūpeṇa vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate|
563:270: katamena punarbhagavan karmaṇā iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate|
563:271: bhagavānāha-evaṃrūpeṇa subhūte vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate|
563:272: ihaiva te subhūte mohapuruṣāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitā bhaviṣyanti,
563:273: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
563:276: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca pratibādhitāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ [buddhabodhiḥ] pratibādhitā bhavati|
563:277: buddhabodhau pratibādhitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā pratibādhitā bhavati|
563:280: tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghe'pi pratibādhite evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ triratnātparibāhyabhāvo bhavati,
563:282: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-ko'tra bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yatsa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate?
563:283: bhagavānāha-mārādhiṣṭhito vā subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati|
563:284: duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena vā karmaṇā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nāsya śraddhā,
563:286: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ pāpābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyate|
563:287: punaraparaṃ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pāpamitrahastagato vā bhaviṣyati,
563:290: ātmotkarṣī pareṣāṃ paṃsako doṣāntaraprekṣī vā bhaviṣyati|
563:291: ebhirapi subhūte caturbhirākāraiḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
563:292: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate iti||
